account.delete-account-header: Enter your password if you are sure you want to delete your account
account.delete-account-message: Deleting your account is irreversible, all your data will be lost!
account.delete-fail: Something went wrong, your account could not by fully deleted.
account.delete-success: Your account has been succesfully deleted. You will now logout

connection.error-retry: Something went wrong, do you want to try again?

consent-question.answer:
I have read/listened to how my personal information will be stored securely. I understand that it is required to send my personal information to receive cash aid.

I understand who sees my personal information.

By tapping "I agree" I choose to participate in the aid program.

By tapping "I disagree" I choose not to participate in the aid program.
consent-question.question:
To apply for this aid program you need to agree to how we secure your personal information.

Please read or listen to how we secure your personal information.

create-account.conclusion: Great! You have created an account.
create-account.create-password-explanation: Create a password of at least {{minimalLength}} numbers:
create-account.introduction: To create an account you need to complete the following steps.
create-account.unequal-passwords: The passwords you created are not the same. Please try again.
create-account.username-not-unique: The name you entered is not unique. Please try again.
create-account.username-password: Enter your full name and create a password.

enroll-in-program.introduction-information: To make sure you get the best possible help and a fair process, we need some personal information.
enroll-in-program.please-confirm: Below is an overview of your information. Please check and then tap send.

inclusion-status.inclusion-status-negative: Unfortunately we have to inform you that you will not receive any (more) payments for this program. If you have questions, please contact us.
inclusion-status.inclusion-status-positive: You have been included in the program.
inclusion-status.notify: We will notify you if you are included.

login-account.incorrect-credentials: The combination of your full name and password you provided is not recognized. Please try again.
login-account.introduction: To use an existing account you need to log in with your full name and password.

preprinted-qrcode.error: The scanned QR-code cannot be used, please try another one.
preprinted-qrcode.introduction: The Aidworker/Volunteer will scan a QR-code to link your information and give it to you. Please keep your physical QR-code safe.
preprinted-qrcode.question: Does the Aidworker/Volunteer have a pre-printed QR-code to scan?
preprinted-qrcode.result-ok: The scanned QR-code is now connected to your account and personal information. Please keep your physical QR-code safe.

registration-summary.documents: Make sure to have these documents ready:
registration-summary.info-message:
To activate your account

When you create your account you will receive a print out of your digital ID that looks like this.
You will need to bring this and the following physical documents below to a meeting with an Aid worker to activate your account.
  • Your National Identity Card

What if I don’t have a card? Then you have 2 options:
  1. Bring a letter from the chief that confirms his/her identity
  2. Bring your X number (need the name of this number like BSN number) from the National Bureau of Registration. You will have to pay for a new one the price will be X.
registration-summary.no-validation-conclusion:
Thank you. Your registration is now complete.

You should receive an SMS on the provided phone number shortly that confirms your registration.

You will be informed if your application has been successful within 14 days.

This is the final message for now.
registration-summary.qr-code: Please show this QR-code to the aidworker when asked.
registration-summary.validation-conclusion:
Thank you. Your registration is now complete. You should receive an SMS on the phone number you provided. This SMS confirms your registration.

In the following weeks, an Aid Worker from the organisation might reach out to you to organise a meeting to validate the information you provided. The Aid Worker will come to you for this meeting.

attributes.error: Something went wrong, please try again.
attributes.introduction: For this option we also need the following:
attributes.success: Thank you. Your information is saved.

select-fsp.introduction: Please select how you would like to receive your aid, if you are included in the program.

introduction.fr: Choisissez votre langue, s'il vous plaît.

select-program.introduction: You can use this app to apply for an aid program. Please select below.
select-program.no-published-programs: There are currently no programs open for registration. Please return here later.

set-notification-number.conclusion-skipped: You have not left a phone number for us to reach you on. Please log in back here regularly, to check on updates.
set-notification-number.conclusion-submitted: Thank you. You will now receive notifications on this phone number: {{phone}}
set-notification-number.input-label: Your phone number with country-code. It should look like this example: {{phoneNumberExample}}
set-notification-number.introduction1: It is optional to enter your phone number.
set-notification-number.introduction2: We use this to send you text-notifications if you are included and when you may receive aid.
set-notification-number.introduction3: If you do not want to enter your phone number, you will have to log in to this app for updates.
set-notification-number.introduction4: At the end of the program, we will delete your number.

validation.phone-number: We couldn't verify that phone-number. Please update and try again.

signup-signin.introduction: To apply for this aid program, you need to have an account. Please create your account or use your existing account.

validation.date: The date format you inputted is not valid. A valid date format example is 31-12-1970 which follows day-month-year, DD-MM-YYYY
validation.email: The email needs to have a valid format. For example: 'full.name@example.com'. Please adjust and try again.
validation.generic-error: We cannot process some of your answers. Please check and update your answers.
validation.number: The answer needs to be a valid number. Please adjust and try again.
validation.phone-number: We couldn't verify this phone-number. Please adjust and try again.
validation.required: An answer is required for this question. Please adjust and try again.

qr-scanner.error-no-permissions: Please allow the camera to be used or check if its not already in use and try again.
qr-scanner.error-not-compatible: Your device is not able to scan
qr-scanner.title: Scan QR-code
